carpet.rule.LogUpdateInteration.desc:
Show number of update, see UpdateInterationValue to set value.
0: disable
1: actionbar
2: actionbar + chat
carpet.rule.MaxUpdateChain.desc: Set max chained neighbor updates at runtime
carpet.rule.UpdateInterationValue.desc: Set the current iteration on update, put at 2147483641 too see weird things
carpet.rule.DisableCollector.desc: Disable the update collector (also know as ChainRestrictedNeighborUpdater)
